name: People & Roles
description: Learn how to manage team members and organizational structure

steps.title: People Management
steps.content: The People section lets you manage your organization's team members and structure.

steps.title: Adding Team Members
steps.content: Click 'Add Person' to invite new team members to your organization.

steps.title: Org Chart
steps.content: Navigate to the Org Chart to visualize your organization's hierarchy.

steps.title: Roles
steps.content: Define roles to group responsibilities and permissions.

steps.title: Functions
steps.content: Functions are atomic units of work that can be assigned to roles.
